p.s: The given text from chapter 24 of the novel The Hate U Give by Angie Thomas describes the riots in the suburb of Garden Heights.
Starr finds herself in the middle of protestors who want justice for Khalil.
When Starr sees the hairbrushes and t-shirts with Khalil's face on it, she remembers the night Khalil has been murdered and how he has been killed.
Starr wants revenge for Khalil and starts to chant with the other protestors as loud as she can.
She also sees her attorney standing on a police car with a bullhorn in hands and raising her fist for black power, leading the protest.
Starr starts to talk about injustice as soon as Ms. Ofrah gave her the bullhorn.
